Osei Kyei Mensah Bonsu (nke a maara dị ka Lawrence Addae ma amụọ na 3 Febụwarị 1957) bụ onye Ghana na-eme atụmatụ obodo na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị. Ọ bụ ugbu a onye isi kachasị n'ime ndị omeiwu Ghana nakwa Minista A họpụtara maka ihe gbasara ndị omeiwu na Ghana.
O sitere na Bremang-Afrancho, obodo dị na Kumasi, Ashanti Region. N'afọ 1982, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah na nzere Bachelor of Science na Urban Planning.
Osei bụ onye otu New Patriotic Party
Ọ buru ụzọ bụrụ onye otu nzuko omeiwu na Jenụwarị 1997
Ọ debere oche ya kemgbe ahụ, na-anọchite anya mpaghara ya na 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th na 7th nke 4th Republic of Ghana
Ọ bụ onye isi oche maka kọmitii mmefu ego pụrụ iche, ụlọ, na azụmaahịa
Ọ bụkwa onye otu na-ahụ maka ego, Mines na Energy, Order Standing, na Kọmitii Nhọrọ.
A họpụtara Osei na mbụ n'ime ndị omeiwu n'oge ntuli aka Ghana nke 1996 na Tiketi nke New Patriotic Party na-anọchite anya Suame Constituency na Ashanti Region nke Ghana

O nwetara vootu 47,455 n'ime vootu 64,394 ziri ezi nke na-anọchite anya 57.40% megide Paul Yeboah onye otu NDC nke nwetara vootu 10,828, Azong Alhassan onye otu PNC nke nwetara voolu 3,219 na Habiba Atta onye otu CPP nke nwetara voọ 2,892.
